description: Canonical inventory snapshot for a SKU on a specific marketplace.

fields.name: quantity_reserved
fields.description: Units reserved for pending orders (not yet shipped).

fields.name: quantity_inbound
fields.description: Units in transit to the fulfillment center (Amazon FBA inbound shipments).

fields.name: quantity_unfulfillable
fields.description: Units in fulfillment center but deemed unsellable (damaged, expired, etc.).

fields.name: fulfillment_channel
fields.description: Who holds the stock: seller warehouse (merchant) or marketplace warehouse (FBA, etc.).

fields.name: last_updated_at
fields.description: UTC timestamp of last inventory update from the marketplace.
